name: Logo Lounge
description:
Logo Lounge is a logo guessing game made in Microsoft PowerPoint, by me!
It's the pretty standard type of logo guessing game but it's divided into categories, and each category has a little twist in it (like choosing colors, or guessing with just a silhouette...)!

I have made 3 categories available (35 logos) to be played in this short Demo. I am very uncertain about the future of this project, so depending on the public reception it gets, I'll see what I'll do with it.

If anybody has any suggestions for category ideas or the overall design and feel of this game, please let me know!
